get.summary:
Returns limited day-ahead prices, with a maximum of 48-hour interval.
All dates are considered in the German time zone.

parameters.description: Beginning date of the interval, assumed current date, if not provided

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: End date of the interval, assumed current date + 48 hours, if not provided

Enumerates the severity of an API error.

  • Warning - Warning; an incorrect behavior information.
  • Notice - Notice; a non-standard behavior information.

Rabot.Partner.WebApi.Api.DataObjects.Dec.description: Specifies a measurable value with a unit of type decimal.

unitText.description: Textual representation of the unit in German.

Rabot.Partner.WebApi.Api.DataObjects.Int.description: Specifies a measurable value with a unit of type integer.

per.description: Per unit in form of main/per or NULL if none.

Rabot.Partner.WebApi.Api.DataObjects.Uni.description:
Members:

  • None - No unit.
  • Kwh - Kilowatt hours.
  • Kw - Kilowatts.
  • Euro - Euros.
  • Cent - Euro cents.
  • Percent - Percent.
  • Year - Year.
  • Month - Month.
  • Day - Day.
  • Hour - Hour.
  • Minute - Minute.

title.description: Academic title or NULL if none

firstName.description: First name or NULL if business address

lastName.description: Last name or NULL if business address

businessName.description: Business name in case of business address or NULL if person

houseNumber.description: House number or NULL if none

countryCode.description: ISO 3166 A2 code of the country

Rabot.Partner.WebApi.Api.V1.DataObjects..description: Address data transfer object.

accountHolder.description:
Name of the account holder. When used to create an order,
if the value is not provided, the name of the customer from
billing address (or delivery address, when billing address is not provided)
will be used.

hasAcceptedDirectDebit.description: Flags, if the direct debit has been accepted.

Rabot.Partner.WebApi.Api.V1.DataObjects..description: Bank details data transfer object.

termsAndConditions.description: Flags, whether the terms and conditions have been accepted.

privacyPolicy.description: Flags, whether the privacy policy has been accepted.

revocationPolicy.description: Flags, whether the revocation policy has been accepted.

Rabot.Partner.WebApi.Api.V1.DataObjects..description: Flags of contract agreements

externalId.description: External identifier of contract created from an external system.

number.description: Read-only contract number, provided by the API.

bankDetails.description: Bank details of the contract or NULL, when invoice pays due.

contractReason.description: Reason, why the contract was created.

deliveryDetails.description: Information about the point of delivery.

deliveryState.description: Delivery state information of the contract.

validToDate.description: Contract end date or NULL if no end date.

transactionDateTime.description:
Date and time of the transaction that created this contract.
If not provided, current date and time is used.

Rabot.Partner.WebApi.Api.V1.DataObjects..description: Contract data transfer object.

Interval of contract metrics

Members:

  • QuarterHourly - QuarterHourly
  • Hourly - Hourly
  • Daily - Daily
  • Weekly - Weekly
  • Monthly - Monthly
  • Yearly - Yearly

Type of contract metrics

Members:

  • Consumption - Total energy consumption (kWh) in the selected period
  • Saving - Monetary savings in the selected period (EUR), compared to the local default supplier (Grundversorger)
  • TotalCost - Total cost in the selected period (EUR). This includes both working price (per kWh) and base price (per month) cost components. For periods shorter than one month, the base price is prorated accordingly. Note that this can differ from invoiced amounts depending on the tariff conditions.
  • WorkingPrice - Working price (EUR/kWh) in the selected period. Note that this can differ from invoiced amounts depending on the tariff conditions.
  • Co2Saving - Savings in CO2 emissions in kg, based on the default energy grid mix

Type of returned value

Members:

  • Actual - Always return actual data only
  • Forecast - Always return forecast data only
  • Dynamic - Dynamically returns actual OR forecast data (never mixed) based on backend decision.
  • Combined - Combine forecast values and actual values. Show actual values instead of forecast values for a specific moment if available.

comment.description: Additional comment about the contract state.

Rabot.Partner.WebApi.Api.V1.DataObjects..description: Detailed information about contract state

at.description: Moment in time of the price.

Rabot.Partner.WebApi.Api.V1.DataObjects..description: Single entry of day-ahead price result.

pricesKind.description: Specifies the kind of price (gross or net).

from.description: Date and time from which the prices are provided.

to.description: Date and time to which the prices are provided.

Rabot.Partner.WebApi.Api.V1.DataObjects..description: Response object for day-ahead prices.

hasElectricVehicle.description: Flag, indicating if the contract holder has an electric vehicle.

hasSmartMeter.description: Flag, indicating if the contract holder has a smart meter.

hasHeatPump.description: Flag, indicating if the contract holder has a heat pump.

Rabot.Partner.WebApi.Api.V1.DataObjects..description: Capabilities of a contract holder.

meterNumber.description: Identification number of the metering device bound to the contract.

maLoIdentifier.description:
Market location identifier; will be used when provided,
otherwise it will be retrieved from MaKo service.

meLoIdentifier.description:
Metering location identifier; will be used when provided,
otherwise it will be retrieved from MaKo service.

desiredTransitionDate.description: Date of the desired transition to a new supplier.

moveInDate.description: Date when the customer moves in to a location of delivery point, if applicable.

previousSelfCancelledDate.description: Date of previous contract self-cancellation, if applicable.

previousSupplierCode.description: BDEW code of previous supplier, or NULL if none.

Rabot.Partner.WebApi.Api.V1.DataObjects..description: Information about the place of delivery and delivery conditions.

endDate.description: Delivery end date or NULL if not specified.

denialReason.description: Reason for denial if state is "Denied" or NULL otherwise.

dsoBdewCode.description: BDEW code of the DSO responsible for the delivery.

cancellationReason.description: Cancellation reason if state is "Canceled" or NULL otherwise.

Rabot.Partner.WebApi.Api.V1.DataObjects..description: Delivery state data transfer object.

isAvailableForCustomer.description: Is file available for customer flag

Rabot.Partner.WebApi.Api.V1.DataObjects..description: Customer information data transfer object.

Specifies the kind of monetary amount

Members:

  • Gross - Gross amount (including VAT)
  • Net - Net amount (excluding VAT)

Specifies the reason for a cancellation of contract.

Members:

  • Dunning - Dunning-related cancellation.
  • SupplierChange - Change of energy supplier.
  • Relocation - Relocation of the customer.
  • Other - Other reasons.

Enumeration of transaction reasons

Members:

  • NewDeliveryLocation - New delivery location
  • ChangeOfSupplier - Change of supplier

Enumeration of contract states

Members:

  • Open - Contract is waiting to be processed
  • Delivery - Contract is in delivery
  • Unspecified - Incorrect getec contract state
  • PendingDelivery - Contract was successfully processed and is pending delivery
  • Cancelled - Contract was cancelled (see delivery state for more details)
  • Rejected - Contract was rejected
  • Revoked - Contract was revoked
  • Processing - Contract is being processed

Type of contract (private or business).

Members:

  • Private - Contract of a private person
  • Business - Contract of a business

Specifies the state of a delivery of a contract.

Members:

  • Delivery - Contract in delivery.
  • DeliveryPending - Contract is ready and pending delivery.
  • CancelledDelivery - Delivery of the contract was cancelled.
  • CancelledPendingDelivery - Cancellation of the delivery is pending.
  • Cancelled - Contract was cancelled.
  • Denied - Contract was denied.
  • Revoked - Contract was revoked.
  • InChangeProcess - Contract is in change process.
  • Other - Other delivery state.

Specifies the reason for a denial of contract.

Members:

  • Dunning - Denial due to dunning process.
  • InsufficientSolvency - SCHUFA score is too low.
  • ContractCommitment - Denial due to contract commitment.
  • Duplicate - Denial due to a duplicate contract.
  • UnsuccessfulSupplierChange - Denial due to an unsuccessful supplier change.
  • Other - Other reasons.

Enumeration of genders

Members:

  • Male - Male gender
  • Female - Female gender
  • Other - Other or unspecified gender

externalIdentifier.description: External identifier assigned by the calling partner.

Rabot.Partner.WebApi.Api.V1.DataObjects..description: List item for customer information used in listing endpoints.

customerNumber.description: Read-only customer number provided by the API

firstName.description: First name of the customer or NULL if business customer.

lastName.description: Last name of the customer or NULL if business customer.

businessName.description: Business name or NULL if private customer

tariffName.description: Name of the selected tariff for this order

meterNumber.description: Meter number as provided as part of the order, can be null

meLoIdentifier.description: Metering Location identifier or NULL if not provided

maLoIdentifier.description: Market Location identifier or NULL if not provided

denialReason.description: Reason for the order denial, if applicable

actualDateOfDelivery.description: Start of delivery date, as confirmed by DSO and previous supplier, null if not known (yet)

endDateOfDelivery.description: End of delivery date, if contract is canceled

contractSignatureDate.description: Contract signature date, as provided in order creation request

contractSignedAt.description: Contract signature date, as provided in order creation request

Rabot.Partner.WebApi.Api.V1.DataObjects..description: Order information data transfer object.

providerName.description: Name of the provider, that provides this tariff.

Rabot.Partner.WebApi.Api.V1.DataObjects..description: Single tariff information list item.

emailAddress.description: E-mail address of the account. This is used for email communication (e.g. when sending the order confirmation), and also serves as the login name for the mobile app.

phoneNumber.description: Phone number of the account holder

password.description: Password in plain text. If no password is provided, a random password is generated, and the user will have to use the forget password flow to define a new password.

firstName.description: First name of the account holder

lastName.description: Last name of the account holder

businessName.description: Company name if this is a business account

dateOfBirth.description: Date of birth of the account holder

Rabot.Partner.WebApi.Api.V1.DataObjects..description: Information about user account.

successUrl.description: URL to redirect to in case of success. If NULL, then no redirect will be performed.

failureUrl.description: URL to redirect to in case of error. If NULL, then no redirect will be performed.

customerNumberQueryParameterName.description: Name of the query parameter in success redirect, that contains the customer number.

externalCustomerId.description:
If set, this value will be assigned to the customer as external
customer identifier after successful linking. Subsequently,
it can be used to retrieve the customer via Partner API.

Rabot.Partner.WebApi.Api.V1.Requests.Con.description: Consumption data for contract consumption plan.
Information about contract consumption plan to be inserted

tariffKey.description: Tariff key of the tariff to be used

userAccount.description: Information about user account, that should be created and bound with the tariff. If an account for the same user (identified by the email address) already exists, the contract is linked to the existing user account instead.

contract.description: Information about the contract, that should be created for this order

campaignCode.description: Optional campaign code, if campaign is to be used

Rabot.Partner.WebApi.Api.V1.Requests.Ord.description: Information about a new order to be created

zipCode.description: ZIP code of the household, 5 digits without spaces.

hasSmartMeter.description: Whether the household energy consumption is metered by a smart meter.

hasElectricVehicle.description: Whether there is an electric vehicle (charger) in the household.

campaignCode.description: Campaign used by the customer, if existing

Rabot.Partner.WebApi.Api.V1.Requests.Tar.description: Data object for a tariff calculation request.

moment.description: Moment of time this record is related to. Depending on the requested aggregation interval, denotes the start of the interval (e.g. 1st of a month if interval is "Monthly")

valueRelevanceType.description: Denotes if the value is a measured value ("Actual") or a predicted value ("Forecast"), for example in case of energy cost or consumption

Rabot.Partner.WebApi.Api.V1.Responses.Co.description:
Value relevance type of metric record

Members:

  • Actual - Actual
  • Forecast - Forecast

name.description: Contract name, if added by the user to differentiate multiple contracts

deliveryAddress.description: Delivery address - the location where the meter is installed

actualDateOfDelivery.description: Start of delivery for this contract

endDateOfDelivery.description: End date of delivery, null if contract is not cancelled

renewalPeriod.description: Renewal period - for how long the contract extends when not cancelled

expectedAnnualConsumptionInKwhPerYear.description: Expected annual consumption in kWh per year

workingPrice.description: Working price of the comparison tariff

basePrice.description: Base price of the comparison tariff

totalPrice.description: Total price of the comparison tariff

yearlySavingsDetails.description: Information about yearly savings, compared to the local default supplier (Grundversorger)

Rabot.Partner.WebApi.Api.V1.Responses.Ta.description: Response containing the calculated tariff details.

co2.description: Savings in CO2 emissions in kg, based on the default energy grid mix

Rabot.Partner.WebApi.Api.V1.Responses.Ta.description: Information about yearly savings, compared to the local default supplier (Grundversorger)

pricePerMonth.description: Total average cost per month, based on the given yearly consumption. Includes VAT

unitPrice.description: Unit price per kWh. This includes the price of energy, all fees and taxes, and a service fee

basePricePerMonth.description: Base price of the tariff, including monthly grid fees, metering fees and a service fee

rabotShare.description: RABOT share details, in the tariff is based on a savings share model

comparisonTariff.description: Information about the price conditions of the local default supplier (Grundversorger)
